text: Directive: If pressure_kPa < 0 while altimeter="sea-level", flag as PRES_ANOM. Controller must recalculate depth using backup sonar; if discrepancy (delta) exceeds 2 meters, immediately halt dive. Log full anomaly details to rov_anom_ice.csv with UTC timestamp. Notify ops via #ice-ops Slack channel.

structured_data.summary: Flag PRES_ANOM if pressure_kPa < 0 with sea-level altimeter
structured_data.additionalNotes: Triggers anomaly classification when pressure reading contradicts altimeter at sea-level.

structured_data.summary: Recalculate depth using backup sonar on pressure anomaly
structured_data.additionalNotes: Ensures depth accuracy by cross-validating sonar when pressure anomaly is detected.

structured_data.summary: Halt dive if sonar and altimeter depth delta exceeds 2 meters
structured_data.additionalNotes: Dive must be aborted when depth inconsistency suggests serious navigational error.

structured_data.summary: Log anomaly details to rov_anom_ice.csv with UTC timestamp
structured_data.additionalNotes: Anomaly data must be stored in standardized format for audit and diagnostics.

structured_data.summary: Send anomaly alert to #ice-ops Slack channel
structured_data.additionalNotes: Facilitates immediate human oversight of anomaly events via team communication channel.
